TopicSection.Name: BodyText
TopicSection.Content:
You can group data in trellis style using Trellis grouping strategy.

It treats rows as card items of same width and height and layouts them using either horizontal or vertical grouping technique. Trellis grouping strategy also allows dragging an item from one group to another.

The above image is an example of trellis grouping strategy.

A group is removed if there is no item present in it.

Sample Code

In order to use trellis grouping strategy, you need to add the following two file references after "spreadgrid.js" script to your HTML page:

Javascript

JS <link rel="stylesheet" href=".temp/plugins/trellisGroupStrategy.css">
<script src=".temp/plugins/trellisGroupStrategy.js"></script>
